author: yonik
msg: SOLR-1930: remove Config and ResourceLoader deprecations

author: rmuir
msg: SOLR-2299: enforce resource handling, prevent test interference by running in a jvm-unique CWD (under build/, same as tempDir)

author: norman
msg: Allow to change loglevel via JMX

author: pieber
msg: [KARAF-350] provide KARAF_OPTS for additional configurations using export or set on the cmd

author: adrianc
msg: Create a new permission checking service to make permission handling easier. The new service returns Boolean values for all CRUD + View permissions - avoiding the need to do multiple permission service calls.
The main purpose of the service is to control multiple screen elements with a single service call. This reduces screen widget and template code. Example:
<!-- This screen must be included before any decorators -->
<!-- screen elements controlled by has*Permission field values -->
